Summary: 5-6 redish orbs to my west- each slowly disappearing into clouds (guess)
divs: sighting detailswas sitting on the back patio with 3 family members when i noticed red lights to the west, over the neighbors house. i first thought they were fireworks- but quickly realized they were hovering\flying. there were 5-6 of these orbs-in kind of a question mark shape- i quickly ran to the front yard to get an unobstructed view, and noticed one by one they either started to fade out- or disappear into the cloud cover. one stayed lit for a few seconds more. i was able to get the kids outside to see the last light in the sky. i also guessed that these might be chinese lanterns- but i estimate the distance they were at to be too great to be as visible\bright\large- they were as bright as aircraft landing lights- only red. i estimated their location to be near the indiana border. they were completely silent.
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Cincinnati
There were no other sightings in Cincinnati on or around May 25th 2013
